snippet: Carla Suárez Navarro won her first career title Saturday, at the Portugal Open in Ociras, and top-seeded Tomas Berdych eased into the men’s final by beating Victor Hanescu, 6-2, 6-2.
abstract: Carla Suarez Navarro defeats Svetlana Kuznetsova to win the Portugal Open tennis tournament, her first career title; top-seeded Tomas Berdych eases into the men’s final by beating Victor Hanescu; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Carla Suárez Navarro won her first career title Saturday, at the Portugal Open in Ociras, and top-seeded Tomas Berdych eased into the men’s final by beating Victor Hanescu, 6-2, 6-2.

headline.main: Suárez Navarro Wins Her First Career Title
headline.print_headline: Suárez Navarro Wins Her First Career Title
